{"speaker_A":[{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/d282a90e4c554fd3bb2688938cb0ad42.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/4819769013ba440e9b9cdc8fb4fd2eb5.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/05dd7801d5384b60a7e1442b50bfaea2.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/cc4aa512351f42588d6c8b55171b5b3d.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/54d4084e3126430fb1eb8c9c4940f289.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/7ed049a0a7cc492db34ace14a5672815.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/f0127bd0922e40a1a155ce7989d4bb42.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/055f93a30ccb4d93859264121c05dc0e.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"}],"speaker_B":[{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/3e098246f7b9423087c1aa987953bc68.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/e8bac4e7cd1e481d8295599dd8252829.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/2b019d7b79824881bbcb2220a71ad93f.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/f256dbc22c8d42f7bb7d70a3b3f1b1c8.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/453f0eda57284872b8fdf0ed021f3050.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/4ab7d24f63d549b8b06e853317e19c6c.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/b9cc63eded05409592b4366b4319f17f.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"},{"code":0,"data":{"link":"https://lf-bot-studio-plugin-resource.coze.cn/obj/bot-studio-platform-plugin-tos/artist/image/e09fa655ec004222b1003bc0f950ad31.mp3"},"log_id":"202507031612468B6F5A415D2B3519FE3D","msg":"success"}],"text":[{"speaker":"A","text":"欸，你有没有想过一个问题，就是‘你有勇气发掘自己内心隐藏的宝藏吗’？这可是人生中一个超持久的问题，人类创造力的历史，像艺术、诗歌还有哲学，其实都是在尝试回答这个问题呢。"},{"speaker":"B","text":"哎呀我超有感，这问题确实很值得琢磨。那谁探讨过这个问题啊？"},{"speaker":"A","text":"尼采就考虑过呀。他觉得拥抱困难对充实的人生很重要，还把自我发现之旅看成是最伟大、最有价值的存在难题之一。1873年快到30岁时，他在《作为教育家的叔本华》这篇文章里探讨了怎么发现自我和发挥天赋。"},{"speaker":"B","text":"哇，那他咋说的呀？"},{"speaker":"A","text":"他说不想随波逐流的人，别老给自己找轻松。得听从良知的呼唤：‘做你自己！你现在做的、想的、渴望的，很多都不是真正的你’。年轻灵魂日夜听到这呼唤，会对那种为追求真正自由的人准备的幸福激动不已。"},{"speaker":"B","text":"听起来好有激情啊，那要是没获得这种自由，会咋样呢？"},{"speaker":"A","text":"哎呀，要是灵魂被意见和恐惧束缚，就没法获得这种幸福，生活也会变得又绝望又没意义。逃避自己天赋的人，四处乱看，那就是自然界最可怜的生物了。"},{"speaker":"B","text":"还真是，那咋解决这种存在的无趣呢？"},{"speaker":"A","text":"尼采觉得就像毕加索说的‘要知道画啥就得开始画’，要找到自己，没人能给你建那座你必须独自跨越人生之河的桥。有很多路、桥和半神能帮你，但得付出失去自我的代价。有一条路只有你能走，别问去哪，走就完了！"},{"speaker":"B","text":"有道理，不过这找自己的路肯定不好走，对吧？"},{"speaker":"A","text":"没错，尼采也说了，认识自己是件又黑暗又神秘的事。人可能剥自己好多层皮，都不知道啥是真正的自己。挖掘自己很痛苦、很危险，还容易受伤。但也可以看看自己真正爱过啥，这些东西可能会揭示你自我的基本法则。"},{"speaker":"B","text":"原来是这样。那教育在发现自我这事里起啥作用呢？"},{"speaker":"A","text":"尼采说真正的教育者会揭示你存在的原始意义和基本本质，这别人没法教你，也很难触及。教育者其实就是解放者。真正的文化不是给你假肢体、假鼻子啥的，而是解放，是除草、清碎石、赶害虫，是光和暖，是夜雨。"},{"speaker":"B","text":"说得太妙了。那最后尼采咋总结找自己的方法的？"},{"speaker":"A","text":"他说可能有其他找自己、从麻醉状态中清醒的方法，但反思教育者和培养者是最好的方法。"},{"speaker":"B","text":"哈哈哈，尼采这想法真的很深刻，值得好好琢磨琢磨。"}]}
